name: Blaster Cop (itch)
description:
Details

This is first-person shooter in cyberpunk setting with sythpop soundtrack. It's prequel spin-off to my other game:
Apparatus Technology

Plot

You are the cop and you have to find 'Curva Mater' club owner in downtown, that is filled with criminals and marginals. He sells cyber stimulants which allow users to cheat in the popular virtual reality game project 'Youreality 3D'. What can go wrong?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Basic controls - WASD, Space, Mouse;
Switch weapons - 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, either mouse wheel;
Call menu - Esc.

Credits
